nodes.text: Rowan Delk was a Human male who lived on Tatooine during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Rowan assisted in guiding Jedi Master Eriz Vossan through the desert. Rowan saw how noble and bright he was as a Jedi Master, but when he suffered from a terrible plague that Lord Vivicar formed, he became insane which displeased Rowan until he got himself sick. Despite his illness, Rowan Delk met with a Jedi Consular who was here to search for Master Vossan. He suggested in meeting at a settlement named Malcolm's Dunes in the Dune Sea of the desert planet. After meeting at the settlement, he and the Consular found a message from Master Vossan, in which he claimed to be searching for the ultimate species of warriors after seeing a vision. Rowan was present with the Jedi Consular when he shielded Master Vossan from the illness, curing him.
